name: indistinguishably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes it impossible to judge two things as being different from each other: The ink and the water began to merge together indistinguishably. It will take long time before I am able to speak German indistinguishably from a native speaker.
More examplesFewer examplesAll of the athletes gave indistinguishably bland replies when they were interviewed.After about half an hour, the songs started to fade into one another indistinguishably.Although she was Canadian, she found it easy to fit indistinguishably into the cultural life of New England.
